name: Fokker Triplane Flight Simulator
overview: Fokker Triplane is a fun flight simulator without the need to spend hours studying complicated instructions. Learn to take off and land, do loops and rolls, burst balloons, bomb specific targets and blow up enemy fuel depots. Fly among six different air bases and capture the real feeling of open cockpit flying. Control how the enemy aircraft will fly. Either ask them to fly directly in front of you for simple target practice or make them fly loop the loop for a tougher challenge. When you are ready, engage in real dog-fighting with the enemy. Fokker Triplane is realistic... and fun
